source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: Become Attractive Simply by Helping People To Like You.
items.headline: 6 EASY Principles That Will Enhance Your Attraction!!
objectives_summary: You’ll learn 6 key principles on how to help people to like you, and how to implement them in your life.
You'll learn to BUILD RAPPORT with others easily and quickly.
You will recognize things that you say and do that may offend people.

items.title: Mind Mastery Training Level I - The 4 Elements
items.headline: A Path To Inner Power Begins With Self-Knowledge
objectives_summary: Undestand other people on a completely new level that will allow you to lead, influence and help others in a way you have never thought was possible
Find a perfect employee for your company needs
Learn to successfully negotiate with different personality types and to create your offer in a way that makes it irresistible to them

items.title: How To Write Like Malcolm Gladwell Series Vol.1

visible_instructors.job_title: Author of "Malibu Code: Learn HTML, CSS and JavaScript"

visible_instructors.title: Martin Kenny

items.headline: The art of crafting persuasive narratives using a Gladwell-esque understanding of personalities, roles, hierarchy, etc.
objectives_summary: You will be able to deconstruct the writing style of Malcolm Gladwell and countless other authors and writers
You will understand what makes Gladwell such a powerful creator of thrilling narratives that engage personalities, emotions, and the social hierarchies that exist around us
You will be able to use Gladwell's style to infuse your writing with powerful strategies to engage the reader and make them want to follow your lead

objectives_summary: Uncovering what gets in the Way

• Retrieving, replaying, rewriting, and recreating the story (or stories) you tell yourself is critical for success. Do you KNOW what they are? If not you will learn. Then we will work though changing it.

items.headline: Attitude building, four types of attitude, 5 ways to tackle attitudinal problems, develop positive attitude for success.

You will learn about the key factors that influence attitude.
You will learn about the three different levels of attitude.

items.title: Learn the Ethical Manipulation Technique
items.headline: REVEALED: A Little Known, Unique & Revolutionary Technique to Quickly and Easily Motivate, Influence & Persuade Others
objectives_summary: –	Learn how to interpret the hidden messages that lie behind what would normally appear to be unimportant words and phrases
–	Learn how to interpret the hidden messages that lie behind what would normally appear to be unimportant words and phrases
–	Learn how to quickly, easily and covertly profile someone to ethically manipulate during informal or casual conversation.
